item.title: Joe Biden Is Weakening American Energy Production on His Way Out of Office
item.description: The departing president’s latest restrictions on drilling and development are designed to placate environmentalists and undermine Trump’s energy agend...

item.title: How Social Conservatives Can Make the Most of a Second Trump Administration
item.description: The next four years will present significant opportunities for social conservatives to catalyze a moral and cultural renaissance.

item.title: Kathy Hochul’s Highly Uncertain Future
item.description: The unpopular New York governor faces stiff political headwinds this year, as fellow Democrats appear to be gearing up for a 2026 primary challenge.

item.title: Inanimate Object Commits Heinous Crime
item.description: After the New Orleans massacre, press headlines and news alerts followed the tired formula of treating the truck as the killer.

item.title: How to Make Your New Year’s Resolution Stick
item.description: The overwhelming majority of people who use the start of a new year as an occasion for self-improvement fail. Here’s how you might succeed.
